mapper.sql: id, tutor_id, user_id, create_time, update_time, status, brief_description, start_time, end_time, subject_id, topic_id, title, fee, transaction_id, time_zone, teaching_method, teaching_description
mapper.select:
select a.id, a.tutor_id, a.user_id, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.status, a.brief_description, a.start_time, a.end_time, a.subject_id, a.topic_id, a.title, a.fee, a.transaction_id, u.user_name as u_user_name, u.school_id as u_school_id, u.first_name as u_first_name, u.last_name as u_last_name, u.avatar_url as u_avatar_url, u.avatar_url_in_provider as u_avatar_url_in_provider, u.id as u_id, v.* from ${schema}.wq_appointment a inner join ${schema}.wq_user_profile u on u.id = a.user_id inner join ( select t1.id t_id, u1.user_name t_user_name, u1.first_name t_first_name, u1.last_name t_last_name, u1.school_id t_school_id, u1.avatar_url t_avatar_url, u1.avatar_url_in_provider t_avatar_url_in_provider from ${schema}.wq_tutor_profile t1 inner join ${schema}.wq_user_profile u1 on t1.user_id = u1.id ) v on v.t_id = a.tutor_id where a.tutor_id = #{tutor_id} and a.status <> -1
AND a.status = 0
AND a.status IN (1,2)
AND a.status IN (3,4)
AND a.status IN (-1,-2,-3)
order by a.create_time desc

select a.id, a.tutor_id, a.user_id, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.status, a.brief_description, a.start_time, a.end_time, a.subject_id, a.topic_id, a.title, a.fee, a.transaction_id, u.user_name as u_user_name, u.school_id as u_school_id, u.first_name as u_first_name, u.last_name as u_last_name, u.avatar_url as u_avatar_url, u.avatar_url_in_provider as u_avatar_url_in_provider, u.id as u_id, v.* from ${schema}.wq_appointment a inner join ${schema}.wq_user_profile u on u.id = a.user_id inner join ( select t1.id t_id, u1.user_name t_user_name, u1.first_name t_first_name, u1.last_name t_last_name, u1.school_id t_school_id, u1.avatar_url t_avatar_url, u1.avatar_url_in_provider t_avatar_url_in_provider from ${schema}.wq_tutor_profile t1 inner join ${schema}.wq_user_profile u1 on t1.user_id = u1.id ) v on v.t_id = a.tutor_id where a.user_id = #{userId} and a.status <> -1
AND a.status = 0
AND a.status IN (1,2)
AND a.status IN (3,4)
AND a.status IN (-1,-2,-3)
order by a.create_time desc
mapper.insert:
insert into ${schema}.wq_appointment
tutor_id,
user_id,
create_time,
update_time,
status,
brief_description,
start_time,
end_time,
subject_id,
topic_id,

fee,

teaching_description,

mapper.update:
update ${schema}.wq_appointment
tutor_id = #{tutorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
brief_description = #{briefDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
subject_id = #{subjectId,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
topic_id = #{topicId,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fee = #{fee,jdbcType=INTEGER},
transaction_id = #{transactionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time_zone = #{timeZone, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
teaching_method = #{teachingMethod, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
teaching_description = #{teachingDescription, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE ${schema}.wq_appointment
tutor_id = #{tutorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
brief_description = #{briefDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
subject_id = #{subjectId,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
topic_id = #{topicId,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fee = #{fee,jdbcType=INTEGER},
transaction_id = #{transactionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time_zone = #{timeZone, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
teaching_method = #{teachingMethod, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
teaching_description = #{teachingDescription, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where transaction_id = #{transactionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ${schema}.wq_appointment ORDER BY start_time DESC
